articles.description: WORLD CUP 2022 PREVIEW: IRAN - Saman Ghoddos tells Mirror Football that speaking out is "the right thing to do" despite fears of repercussions as Islamic regime sentence thousands of protestors to death
articles.content:
It is hard not to admire the courage of Saman Ghoddos, the Premier League s only Iranian, as he explains why there is an obligation to use this World Cup as a platform to demand change.

articles.author: Richard Fay
articles.title: Manchester United showed how far they've come in 10-second move against Fulham - Manchester Evening News
articles.description: With their opening goal against Fulham at the weekend, Man Utd made headlines for all the right reasons.
articles.content: It's easy to forget, but Manchester United actually played a game on Sunday and won. This week has been all about the fallout from Cristiano Ronaldo's explosive interview, so much so that the win at … [+3140 chars]

articles.title: ATP Finals: Rafael Nadal out after loss to Felix Auger-Aliassime in Turin - BBC
articles.description: Rafael Nadal's hopes of a first ATP Finals title are over after he was knocked out of the tournament in the group stage.
articles.content:
Rafael Nadal has won the French Open and the Australian Open this year
